definition: husk/(of a radish etc) spongy (and therefore unappetising)

sentences.english: Studying primarily conditions for super-fine comminution of rice bran.
sentences.chinese: 初步考察了影響米糠超微細化工藝的因素。

sentences.english: Effects of rice bran addition on farinograph parameters of dough and quality of steamed bread were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了添加米糠對面糰粉質特性和饅頭品質的影響。

sentences.english: He spoke of Husk Power Systems in India.
sentences.chinese: 他還提到了印度的“米糠發電系統”。

sentences.english: The refined rice bran oil could meet the requirements of the national standard four-step.
sentences.chinese: 生產出的成品油，達到國標四級精煉米糠油要求。

sentences.english: Rice bran is a resource rich in vegetable lipopolysaccharide (LPS).
sentences.chinese: 米糠是富含植物脂多糖的植物資源。

sentences.english: Rice bran oil is rich in Vitamin E which provide excellent nutrients to the skin.
sentences.chinese: 而且米糠油含豐富的維生素E，是護養皮膚的聖品。

sentences.english: Rice Bran , Certified Organic Rosehip Oil , Avocado.
sentences.chinese: 米糠，有機野玫瑰果油，鱷梨。

sentences.english: Rice bran oil (RBO) is an inexpensive raw material for the production of biodiesel.
sentences.chinese: 對於生產生質柴油，米糠油是相當便宜的原料用油。

sentences.english: The samples of rice bran products they tested came from Japan and the United States.
sentences.chinese: 米糠產品測試的樣本來自日本和美國。

sentences.english: The effect of rice bran content on the yield and quality of Hypsizygus marmoreus was studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 研究了不同米糠添加量對真姬菇產量和品質的影響。

sentences.english: Supercritical carbon dioxide extraction was applied to degrease rice bran in the present study.
sentences.chinese: 運用響應面法優化米糠超臨界流體脫脂純化工藝。

sentences.english: Results show that the effect of moisture content on rice bran stabilization is great.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，米糠水分含量對微波穩定化效果影響很大。

sentences.english: The fan produces an artificial wind to winnow the grain.
sentences.chinese: 簸谷機產生人工風以掮掉米糠。

definition: okara (i.e. soy pulp, a by-product of making soymilk or tofu)
